Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Mad Mau
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone to work with the Straight Talk $45 dollar plan on AT&T;'s network.  It took some time to set it up the way I wanted, but it has performed flawlessly since.  This phone is a nice step up from my Samsung Exhibit II which took a bath (no, not in the toliet, why does everybody ask me that?  lol).The only downside is that if you want to get rid of the extra AT&T; apps, you'll need to root the phone.  I decided against it since those apps aren't seemingly causing any problems with the E-Mail and other applications I've set up on the phone.  And with an additional 32 meg memory card, I don't need the space they take up.I highly recommend this cellphone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Khan T.
Reviews.Content: It is not 100% unlocked,still At&t;,but it works with T-Mobile.Delivery is fast .The Cosmetic is excellent.Thank you.I would reccommend to my friend

Reviews.Title: Great product. Recommended for anyone.
Reviews.Author: Brenden F.
Reviews.Content: Extremely satisfied with this purchase. I was initially weary of making a new phone purchase but I knew when the time came that this would be the one I'd plan on getting and im totally happy with my choice. Phone does as expected and soooo much more, highly recommend for anyone, 5stars.

Reviews.Title: Cool Phone
Reviews.Author: Tiki Dan
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping. Retail box packed in bubble wrap and packed inside another box to insure it survived USPS. 13 GB of internal memory minus 1 Gb of ATT bloatware leaves lots of space for apps. Fired it up and stuck in a bring your own phone Straight Talk micro sim card (my old phone had a mini sim). Followed the instructions and was making calls in 15 minutes. Set up the APN info from Straight Talk site to get internet. Amazon is the best.

Reviews.Title: good device
Reviews.Author: Woody
Reviews.Content: Its been working spectular. I was scared at first but its a good device, I'm completely happt with my pruchase

Reviews.Title: Not so happy
Reviews.Author: jk
Reviews.Content: Nice phone in very good shape but currently having battery issues since day one where it just starts plunging, no apps installed, location services and wifi turned off and it still plunges. The plunging happens while the phone is sleeping and not even in use. I have two other S3's that have none of these issues, this one may be a lemon. This is the first used phone I have purchased and it may have been a mistake. Will update if I find out more as a Samsung rep is scheduled to look at it in a few days.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: fati
Reviews.Content: The phone was new, unlocked and is working properly. I have nothing to complain about for now. This was a very good deal.

Reviews.Title: Works great with Straight Talk.
Reviews.Author: Dmitriy Prokhnevskiy
Reviews.Content: No complaints. This phone was easy to set up with Straight Talk. It works like new. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S3
Reviews.Author: Winnie F. Lampirez
Reviews.Content: Slight glitch at first ,and slow sometimes ,but able to fix it and it works great now:) Really do love it!!

Reviews.Title: Good quality of refurbished
Reviews.Author: Lisecle
Reviews.Content: Overall a very good quality of refurbished cell phone, it does work well for my daughter in Montreal, Canada. The only thing that I have a concern the battery was not charging quickly, do not know if it is at the lifetime limit!

Reviews.Title: Problems with Galaxy S III unlocked cell phone
Reviews.Author: Lucinda B.
Reviews.Content: The phone is unlocked but it will not connect to my Internet/phone service provider and only connects to WiFi signal locations.

Reviews.Title: mmhhh
Reviews.Author: marsha
Reviews.Content: The phon e not working properly the screen keeps jumping and freezing up very annoying. I never have problem with amazon bef ore until now

Reviews.Title: the intenational is better
Reviews.Author: michal dolev
Reviews.Content: the intenational is better. problems with hot spot and problems with alot of chargers. i cant charge in cars. and cant with any charger that is not cabel that you put in charger.
